item.description:
It has been suggested that we go to a movie around 4 pm and then

Get together someplace after the movie to discuss the movie while

Drinking some coffee.   I will try it out and see how it goes???

http://www.google.com/movies?hl=en&near=north+haven&dq=north+haven+movie+theater&mid=ea4c958ab5589e20&sa=X&ei=1m_IT_4tyfDSAeK7zaEB&ved=0CBIQwAMoAg

 

www.google.com/movies?hl=en&near=north+haven&dq=north+haven+movie+theater&mid=ea4c958ab5589e20&sa=X&ei=1m_IT_4tyfDSAeK7zaEB&ved=0CBIQwAMoAg

 

Those of you who live East and West of New Haven do not

Have to RSVP No and say that it is too far for you to travel.

I will delete that post if I read it.

I will give more detailed information of where to meet only to those

Who RSVP Yes or who E-mail me directly, not to those

Who post on this link.  I am having more problems with

Pain in the Ass Members who are complaining about not having

better information on where to meet. They either were sent that

information and did not bother to read it or did not RSVP Yes

or e-mail me directly with that question.

June starts the 3 strikes you are out rule.

RSVP Yes 3 times and not show up you are deleted

from the group.

This 3 Strikes you are out and deleting those who have not come to the

Site for over a year is "thinning out the herd".

Rather have a small group of dedicated members instead of

a large group who do not get involved or even check out the site.

It is very rude and disrespectful to the rest of the Group Members

To RSVP Yes and make us have to wait for you when you are not going to come.

I do send an e-mail asking those who cannot come to either change their

RSVP to No or give me a call (my cell number is only supplied in direct e-mails.)

More information in an upcoming Trip Report.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone @ Snow White and the Huntsman
